having a lunchtime glass of wine, while writing. feeling french.
Chatting about @scarboroughdude at Podcamp Ottawa
btw, my twitter profile now ranks higher for "julien" in Google than my blog. that's domain-level trust at its finest.
wow, really proud of myself for ONCE AGAIN posting a DM into my public timeline :P
and wow, no 2 weeks or anything.
trying crowdSPRING... really liking it so far. :)
finally getting a fucking appointment to cut my hair. really appalling right now.
speaking to a lawyer. my ex-landlord is REALLY PISSING ME OFF.
Bacon fried rice???
so i really did get a threatening letter from the ex-landlord though. he claims i owe him-- get this-- THIRTEEN THOUSAND DOLLARS.
j/k i'm fine

Going to see a man with a law degree
not for me of course! just in theory.
so where are the twitter porn channels? i mean, they've gotta be somewhere, right?
which we didn't, of course.
k so the update on the 13 grand my ex-landlord says i owe... it's for "emotional damage" and shit he says we destroyed in the old place. :P
Just finished a long lunch w @mitchjoel etc
Ing, worst thing ever: having to look for a job during Xmas time.
New question: Who's so good on Twitter that you could rightly suggest I follow them INSTEAD OF you?

2 tattoo appointments in 2 weeks. Not too shabby.
